comments.body:
@odersky this line is slightly suspicious and wasn't here before, the comments explains why it is necessary.
It seems to me that we actually _don't_ call this method when recording type inference constraints and I don't know why it is not necessary. I tried to add this code to `ConstraingHandling#addOneBound`, but that actually broke some tests.
Maybe add this remark to the comments? Then we have the context if we come back to it.
